scripts.build: npm version prerelease && ng build portallocatario-startapp && npm run generatepublish && npm run publish
scripts.buildQA: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && ng build portallocatario-startapp && npm run generatepublish && npm run publish
scripts.generatepublish: npm run relocationpackage && npm run copynpmrc
scripts.relocationpackage: mkdirp portallocatario-startapp && rimraf portallocatario-startapp && cd dist && move portallocatario-startapp ../portallocatario-startapp
